title: Web Application Developer
description:
He are hiring for an immediate Web Application Developer consulting role working onsite in midtown Manhattan.



In this role you will be responsible for the development and maintenance of an in-house application.



You should have strong coding, unit testing skill, communication skills, a user-service orientation, familiarity with the team decision-making process and excellent problem-solving abilities.



You will work closely with a Business Analyst to review and understand the requirements and then build the application.



Requirements include:





5+ years of experience programming in Javascript/TypeScript, HTML, Angular, ASP.Net, C#.Net, Web Forms, REST, PL/SQL, T-SQL
1+ years of Angular
Ability to create and manage unit test project
Proven experience writing system documentation (system design, detail design, test plans, test execution, implementation plans and implementation execution
Experience working through full SDLC cycle, from system requirements and design specifications through implementation
Strong analytical and problem solving skills
Ability to create and manage unit test project is a plus
Ability to troubleshoot applications and identify root cause of defect
Excellent written and verbal communication
Domain knowledge of Financial/Banking Institution methodologies is a plus
Knowledge of tools: Visual Studio, TFS, SQL Server management studio, Microsoft Office, SVN
OS: Windows 7/10
RDBMS: SQL Server
Seniority level
Associate
Employment type
Full-time
Job function
Information Technology
Industries
